SELECT COMPANY_NAME , ADDRESS , COMPANY_INFORMATION.CI_NO , CI_CEONAME , CI_FOUNDING_DATE , CI_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER , CI_BUSINESS_DETAIL , CI_COMPANY_HISTORY , CI_COMPANY_VISION , CI_HOMEPAGE , A_NO , A_ORIGIN_NAME , A_CHANGE_NAME , A_FILE_PATH , A_STATUS , A_CREATE , S_NO , S_NAME , CT_NO , CT_NAME , INTERESTED_COUNT
, CASE WHEN INTERESTED_COMPANY.CI_NO IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END INTERESTED
FROM COMPANY_INFORMATION
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CI_NO FROM INTERESTED_COMPANY WHERE M_NO = #{userNo}) INTERESTED_COMPANY ON(COMPANY_INFORMATION.CI_NO = INTERESTED_COMPANY.CI_NO)
WHERE COMPANY_INFORMATION.CI_NO = #{companyInformationNo} AND COMPANY_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOB_VACANCY WHERE JV_STATUS_YN = 'Y' AND JV_PERIOD_END ${sign} SYSDATE AND CI_NO = #{companyInformationNo}

SELECT JV_NO , JV_TITLE , JV_PERIOD_END , EDUCATION_LEVEL_NAME , EXPERIENCE_LEVEL_NAME FROM JOB_VACACY_INFORMATION WHERE JV_NO IN (SELECT JV_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, JV_NO FROM (SELECT JV_NO FROM JOB_VACANCY WHERE JV_STATUS_YN = 'Y' AND JV_PERIOD_END ${sign} SYSDATE AND CI_NO = #{companyInformationNo} ORDER BY JV_PERIOD_END DESC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN (#{pi.page}-1)*(#{pi.boardLimit})+1 AND ((#{pi.page}-1)*(#{pi.boardLimit})+1)+(#{pi.boardLimit}-1)) ORDER BY JV_PERIOD_END DESC
SELECT R_NO , R_ENROLL_DATE , R_STATUS_YN , BI_TITLE FROM RESUME JOIN BASIC_INFO BI USING(R_NO) WHERE M_NO = #{userNo} AND R_DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY R_STATUS_YN DESC, R_ENROLL_DATE DESC
